tool_description: Text segmentation is the process of dividing written text into meaningful units, such as words, sentences, or topics.
name: Text segmentation - sentences
title: Text segmentation - sentences

api_list.name: segmentation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-segmentation-sentences.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/segmentation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-segmentation-sentences.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
